build-font-face(family, filebase) { 
    @font-face { 
        font-family: family; 
        src: url(fonts/filebase.eot); 
        src: url(fonts/filebase.eot?#iefix) format('embedded-opentype'), 
             url(fonts/filebase.woff) format('woff'), 
             url(fonts/filebase.ttf) format('truetype'), 
             url(fonts/filebase.svg#svg-id) format('svg'); 
    } 
} 
 
/* These two approaches are equivalent */ 
build-font-face('OpenSans-Light-webfont', 'OpenSansLight'); 
build-font-face(filebase: 'OpenSansLight', family: 'OpenSans-Light-webfont');
